Cliqz Browser
Shared with Cliqz for Android

The Cliqz Ad Blocker is in beta at the moment. The final version will provide the following options: Allow Fair Ads (default setting), Block All Ads, Allow All Ads. More https://cliqz.com/whycliqz/adblocking

Cliqz has blocked access to %1$s because it has been reported as a phishing website. Phishing websites disguise as other sites you may trust in order to trick you into disclosing your login, password or other sensitive information. [Learn more|https://cliqz.com/en/whycliqz/anti-phishing]
Rate Cliqz Browser
Please note: Cliqz Browser has to download some data packages first, before the ad-blocker works efficiently. For this, the app must be connected to Wi-Fi.
Get the best out of Cliqz
Open Cliqz Browser on your computer (or get it from cliqz.com).

Connect Cliqz on your mobile device with Cliqz on your computer. This will allow you to send tabs between your desktop and your mobile device. You can also directly download videos from your desktop browser to your mobile device.
Allow Cliqz Browser to access location information
